title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped up to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
